author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
A few years back the concept of CPU micro architecture levels was formalized you'll see this as x86-64-v3, v4 etc. The problem is this is a retroactive categorization system and does not properly apply to real world CPUs

title: CPU Micro Architecture Levels Are Not Real
